original_text: The inner sanctuary was twenty cubits long, twenty cubits wide, and twenty cubits high, and he overlaid it with pure gold. He also overlaid an altar of cedar.
korean_text: 그 내소의 안은 길이가 이십 규빗이요 너비가 이십 규빗이요 높이가 이십 규빗이라 정금으로 입혔고 백향목 제단에도 입혔더라

sentences.original_text: The inner sanctuary was twenty cubits long, twenty cubits wide, and twenty cubits high
sentences.korean_translation: 내소는 길이가 이십 규빗, 너비가 이십 규빗, 높이가 이십 규빗이었으며

sentences.original_text: and he overlaid it with pure gold
He also overlaid an altar of cedar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또 백향목 제단에 금을 입혔습니다
